Package utils

Class CLI

  • Object
    • utils.CLI
  • public class CLI
extends Object
    This singleton utility class handles all the text commands for the game.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  CLI.Context
      This enum maintains the context the commands are being called in, i.e.

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static CLI cli
      The singleton instance of the CLI class.
      CLI.Context currentContext
      The current context for the game.
      static Scanner input
      The scanner object for reading input from the console.
      (package private) Map<CLI.Context,​ArrayList<String>> validCommands
      A Map of all the valid commands for a specific Context.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor Description
      private CLI()
      The constructor for the CLI class, initiates all the command lists and puts them in the validCommands map.
